title: Jobrium
about: Jobrium is an application analytics platform that enables job seekers to keep track of their applications, view their application histories and set application goals.

title: Friends of Japan
about: Friends of Japan was a social media and content discovery platform focued on Japanese Animation and pop-culture

title: Investigating the Efficient Market Hypothesis
about: An academic paper and machine learning model investigating the validity of the Efficient Market Hypothesis as it applies to the 10 year histories of three companies stock.

title: Predicting Credit Default
about: A machine learning model which attempts to predict the likelihood of default by a prospective credit customer given various demographic and historical information as well as additionally engineered features.
